title: Stop all profilers button
body:
This feature would extend the "Debugging is disabled while profiling..." message to include a button to stop all profilers.

Proposed Design
- Extend the common notification UI to include a button in the far right of the UI as a tab stop
- Add a button that reads "Stop Profiling", which when activated messages any tool that is profiling to stop as if the user hit 'stop profiling' in that tool (e.g. process the report etc.)
